media:group.media:title: NEW: YouTube Shopping Chrome Extension
media:group.media:description:
If you’re a Creator in the YouTube Shopping Affiliate Program, we’re launching a desktop extension that lets you save Shopping products and compare commission rates while browsing your favorite stores on Chrome!
Download the extension here: https://chromewebstore.google.com/detail/youtube-shopping/ighjodkhjaliganonnlmdedfgnomaebi?utm_source=extension-video

NEW: Test & Compare Thumbnails
media:group.media:description:
Not sure which thumbnail to use? Try “Test & Compare” – a feature that lets you choose up to 3 video thumbnails to test with viewers to help pick your winner. Eligible creators can use the “Test & Compare” feature through YouTube Studio desktop when publishing a new video, or with an existing video.
Subscribe and hit the bell to see new videos: https://goo.gl/So4XIG

entry.title: Members Only Content: Videos, Shorts, Live Streams, & Posts for Channel Memberships

media:group.media:title: Members Only Content: Videos, Shorts, Live Streams, & Posts for Channel Memberships
media:group.media:description:
Creating Members-only content is an easy, effective way to offer great perks for your members! With Channel Memberships, you can offer members-only Videos, Shorts, Live Streams, and Posts. Fans consistently tell us that members-only content is their favorite part of memberships, and lets you experiment with more lightweight, casual content – like Q&As, behind-the-scenes looks, clips of upcoming videos, and more.
Check out this article for more info about Channel Membership Perks: https://support.google.com/youtube/answer/7544492
0:00 Members-only content overview 0:29 Members-only Videos 1:01 Members-only Shorts 2:05 Schedule from Members-only to Public 2:46 Members-only Live Streams 3:40 Members-only Posts 4:23 Best Practices for Members-only Content

entry.title: Advertiser-friendly Content Guidelines & Yellow Monetization Icons

media:group.media:title: Advertiser-friendly Content Guidelines & Yellow Monetization Icons
media:group.media:description:
If you’re in the YouTube Partner Program and want to make money through ads, your content needs to follow our Advertiser-friendly Content Guidelines. Advertisers come to YouTube to connect with potential customers, and it’s important to them that their ads only show against content that aligns with their brand. That’s why we have Advertiser-friendly Content Guidelines, to help ensure that YouTube remains a safe place for brands to reach their target audiences – which in turn helps creators earn more money. In this video, we'll walk through: how advertiser-friendly content guidelines work, how you can check your monetization status & what each status icon means, and a deep dive about the Yellow Icon status specifically.
For more information, check out these Help Center articles: https://support.google.com/youtube/answer/6162278 https://support.google.com/youtube/answer/9269751 https://support.google.com/youtube/answer/9208564 https://support.google.com/youtube/answer/7083671 https://support.google.com/youtube/answer/9348366 https://support.google.com/youtube/answer/7687980
00:00 Ad-Friendly Content Guidelines 0:40 How do Ad-Friendly Content Guidelines Work? 2:23 Self-Certification for Monetized Videos 2:52 How to Check Monetization Status 3:11 What Each Monetization Status Means 4:44 Yellow Icon Status & Reviews Deep-Dive 7:01 FAQs about Yellow Icons & Reviews
Subscribe and hit the bell to see new videos: https://goo.gl/So4XIG
► Check out our Help Center: https://goo.gl/fBzr7

entry.title: @MpoomyLedwaba: Becoming a podcast pioneer and trendsetter

media:group.media:title: @MpoomyLedwaba: Becoming a podcast pioneer and trendsetter
media:group.media:description:
If you’re looking for new ways to grow your channel and get some incredible tips from fellow creators, then the Making It podcast is for you.
Hosts @thefabuloushannahh and @tamago2474 connect with @MpoomyLedwaba and creative director & husband Brenden, to discuss how their passion and drive to try new features and formats has taken them to new heights, as they begin to branch out to an international audience. From staying ahead of the game on global trends to maintaining a powerful connection with their community, this powerhouse couple have created an innovative content strategy that explores the delicate balance between creating content that feels comfortable and natural to you as a creator, while prioritising the needs of your community.
#MakingItOnYouTube
Don’t miss the latest updates, follow us on Instagram: https://www.instagram.com/youtubecreators/
Learn how creators are using channel memberships: https://m.youtube.com/watch?v=28y5KRf_l_s
More info on channel memberships: https://www.youtube.com/creators/fanfunding/#fan-funding-channel-membership
Stay up to date on all the latest YouTube features and tips: https://www.youtube.com/channel/UCkRfArvrzheW2E7b6SVT7vQ
Learn more about podcasting on YouTube: https://www.youtube.com/creators/podcasts/

entry.title: @TayoAinaFilms: I fell in love with making videos and now I’m living my dream

media:group.media:title: @TayoAinaFilms: I fell in love with making videos and now I’m living my dream
media:group.media:description:
If you’re looking for new ways to grow your channel and get some incredible tips from fellow creators, then Making It podcast is for you.
Hosts @thefabuloushannahh and @tamago2474 connect with @TayoAinaFilms to discuss how his love for creating travel documentaries has taken him on an incredible journey around the world. From starting out with a phone in his pocket, to creating with more advanced equipment, Tayo’s true passion for creating content shines through. We’ll be diving into the evolution of his content strategy, common misconceptions about collabs, the importance of engaging with your community and how to appeal and grow an international audience, you don’t want to miss this!
00:00 - Intro 02:11 - An early creation versus a latest one 04:21 - Getting started and finding your niche 08:49 - Making money and subscriber growth 14:45 - How to appeal to and grow an international Audience 18:50 - Tayo’s tips for successful creator collabs 21:11 - Building deep connections with your audience 27:00 - Creating long form and short form content 29:33 - Content strategy, planning process and tips 34:14 - How to evolve as creators and keep up with trends 37:42 - Finding a work/life balance 42:28 - What would you tell your younger (YouTube) self?
Resources Check out Tayo’s channel: https://www.youtube.com/@TayoAinaFilms
Don’t miss the latest updates, follow us on Instagram: https://www.instagram.com/youtubecreators/
Learn more about the YouTube Partner Program and eligibility criteria: https://support.google.com/youtube/answer/13429240?sjid=18053086017324582129-EU

media:group.media:title: @BigJetTV : Going Live and building community
media:group.media:description:
If you’re looking for new ways to grow your channel and get some incredible tips from fellow creators, then Making It podcast is for you.
Hosts @thefabuloushannahh and @tamago2474 sit down with @BigJetTV to discover how Jerry and Gilly have built a strong community through exploring their passion for aviation. We’ll be diving into how their thrilling live streams have
gained them a global audience and a strong community of memberships. Expect unfiltered conversation around the unique challenges of going live, top tips on how to keep your audience engaged and the importance of community on YouTube.
As an extra treat, YouTube Community Partner Manager Khalook joins our hosts for a fun, informative quiz on all things YouTube!
00:00 - Intro 01:12 - The beginning of Big Jet TV 02:55 - Challenges and our approach to Live Streaming 05:10 - Moderating Live Chat 09:19 - Reacting to content and comments 10:38 - Getting started with Live Streaming 13:12 - Why we started our YouTube channel 14:12 - Strategy & tips for Live & Channel Memberships 21:32 - The power of community and how to engage an audience 27:17 - What equipment you need 31:14 - Balancing work life and personal life 35:00 - YouTube Quiz with Community Partner Manager, Khalook 50:31 - What would you tell your younger (YouTube) self?
Resources
Don’t miss the latest updates, follow us on Instagram: https://www.instagram.com/youtubecreators/
Learn more about the excitement of going live: https://www.youtube.com/creators/live-streaming-on-youtube/
